Player History
Earned first career win on 7/1/1968...
Injured on 10/13/1969 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Drafted in 7th round, 124th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1976...
Traded from Cleveland to Texas on 5/24/1980 (Going to TEX: P M. Smithson, P C. Puleo, P K. Stanfield. Going to CLE: 2B D. Oliver, P N. Chavez)...
Earned first career win on 6/23/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/7/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $2,650,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/1/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $628,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/8/1992 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Injured on 8/26/1992 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1994...
Injured on 5/24/1995 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/2/1995 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/11/1996 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 7/20/1996 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
